rules.text: Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
Racial, sexist, and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.
Don't crosspost from another social network without participating in the community.
Public images and media must be annotated. Where the material is not yours, source attribution must be provided, preferably with a link to the original.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers.
Please report problematic content so that moderators can take note and take action!
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
